sentences.sentence: She had lived blamelessly until she met this man.
sentences.translation: 在遇到这个男人以前，她一直清清白白地生活着。

sentences.sentence: At that time, the true Israel of God will live blamelessly before Him.
sentences.translation: 那时，上帝的真以色列人，将是完全无可指责。

sentences.sentence: He determined to behave wisely and blamelessly in his own house (101:2).
sentences.translation: 他决定要用智慧行完全的道，也要存完全的心行在祂家中(101：2)。
